com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon

Interface PosTaggerLexicon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Lexicon, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyLexicon, LexiconChain, LexiconFile

    public interface PosTaggerLexicon
extends Lexicon
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon, including pos-tag specific information.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<LexicalEntry> findLexicalEntries(java.lang.String word, PosTag posTag)
      Find the lexical entries corresponding to a given postag for this word.
      java.util.Set<PosTag> findPossiblePosTags(java.lang.String word)
      For a given word, an ordered set of all postags to be considered in tagging (using the natural ordering for postags).
      java.util.List<LexicalEntry> getEntriesForLemma(java.lang.String lemma, PosTag posTag)
      Return all lexical entries for a given lemma and postag.
      java.util.List<LexicalEntry> getEntriesMatchingCriteria(LexicalEntry lexicalEntry, PosTag posTag, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String number)
      Return an entry for the same lemma as the lexical entry provided, matching the criteria provided (posTag, gender, number).

      • Methods inherited from interface com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon.Lexicon

        getAllEntries, getEntries, getEntriesForLemma, getName

    • Method Detail

      • findPossiblePosTags

        java.util.Set<PosTag> findPossiblePosTags(java.lang.String word)
                                   throws TalismaneException
        For a given word, an ordered set of all postags to be considered in tagging (using the natural ordering for postags).
        Parameters:
        word - the word being considered
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • findLexicalEntries

        java.util.List<LexicalEntry> findLexicalEntries(java.lang.String word,
                                                PosTag posTag)
        Find the lexical entries corresponding to a given postag for this word.
        Returns:
        an ordered Set containing the lexical entries, or an empty set if none found
